code.title: Birthday discord bot

content: I started working on this project for fun because one of my friends couldn't find an existing bot that she liked. The main goal was to have a bot where you could save the birthdays of people in the server with a slash command. When the day hits, the bot sends out a message letting everyone know it's that person's birthday. The birthday person also gets a special birthday role.
NodeJS server with discord.js and mongoose installed
Discord bot created through the developer portal, with permissions to use slash commands, manage roles, and send messages
Ability for someone to configure the bot settings to follow appropriate timezone, set birthday role, and set channel that messages should be sent to
MongoDB database to store user birthdays and server specific bot settings
Cron job to check if anyone's birthday is today, send birthday message, if applicable, and add role. Additionally, remove roles when it's no longer person's birthday
Along with the ability to set new birthdays, we also need to be able to delete birthdays and list birthdays

code.description: Discord.js bot that sends out messages on the birthdays of server members. User birthdays as well as server timezone can be set via slash commands, and are stored in a MongoDB database that gets queried during a cron job.

code.title: Color guessing game

content: I really wanted to create a fun little front end game that utilizes my JavaScript skills. This HTML page allows you to play a color guessing game where you need to correspond the correct color to the given hexadecimal value.
Generate given number of hexadecimal values
Set one option as the correct answer

code.description: Web game where the player is given a hexadecimal color code and then has to guess which of the given colors it corresponds to. Includes instructions on how to read hex colors, and calming sound effects.
